Oh, wait! That wasn't fur... That was just... sorry!
Oh, are those some sort of magic sticks? If so, I think the golden one looks more powerful.
Let me take a closer look. If that is okay with you.
Take your time and think I'm not here, I will just be studying your technique.
Or maybe the you from another dimension just used a portal to join you?
Oh boy! I think I saw Princess Celestia use magic like this once...
Unless those are terminologies specific to this world... I think none of those are right, Kyu.
I think somepony has had one too many apple ciders...
Wrestling? No, no, no, you are supposed to help me understand these bodies.
Oh, I see it's not a magic stick, it's just a... oh...
Took you long enough, huh?
Oh, so you could talk all along, huh?
I'm not even this bad at sports!
Well at least the rest of my friends weren't here to see me lose so badly.
This is more awkward than that one time I caught my brother exploring his own body...
If you ask me, those stockings should have been the last thing to go.
Welcome back. I don't know why people tend to get shy a lot in this game, but your bravery won't be forgotten.
Your ponytail was very pretty, Lyn.
One of my friends was bitten a while back and started transforming into this half-pony, half-bat creature at night. It's all under control now... I think...
I'd ask you to teach me how... but something tells me that "Twilight" and "Vampires" are not a combo I'd like...
You look super cute like that, Nagisa!
Oh I heard something about magical necklaces in this world, though by what my friends described they tend to be... way smaller...
Don't lose that crown, Peach. If someone finds it, they might make it the prize of a high school popularity contest...
That drink looks really tasty. Enjoy it, Sei!
Oh, and now one that's blue. Do those have some sort of magical effect?
Wait a second. You are using magic, aren't you? Otherwise how are you making so many drinks appear out of thin air?
Usually I'd recommend taking something else off, but that helmet did seem really uncomfortable.
Hey, you can make stuff float too! Just like unicorns in Equestria!
I hadn't even noticed you were floating, Videl. How do you do that without wings?
I compiled a list of talking points... but I don't have the right words for this...
Those look a bit strange... You may want to check the thing that is stuck between your panties and your crotch.
The basic idea seems to be the same. Of course, it seems to be easier to stroke with fingers than with hooves.
Concentrate, Twilight... Take a lot of notes... Don't get distracted by... ~name~...
And there goes ~name~!
Think you can maybe do that with yours too, Pit?
Mind getting a bit closer so I can examine it closer?
I suddenly feel like going at it again.
So are you a mare or a stallion?
Oh my... I'm going to need a bigger notebook!
How are you able to stay in two legs with those?
Isn't that right, Mika?
I'm sorry I didn't mention this before, but your body is so well worked you might even give Bulk Biceps a run for his money!
Every piece of clothing you take off is a bit more of information about this world for me.
Oh, what will ~name~ take off?
I have no idea why, but the idea of a stallion removing pieces of cloth is making me feel strange...
All right, this will be a good chance to see the differences between mares and stallions stripping.
I may be out now, but that only gives me more freedom to watch you closely as you undress... to take notes of course...
Don't worry about me, I'm just taking a small break.
When my friends and I used the Element of Harmony magic in my crown, we grew pony ears and a tail like you. Does that mean that you have some sort of Element of Harmony related to cats?
Hey! I'm just noticing your wings. You know I also grow a couple of my own in certain situations.
Xander, something about you reminds me of Spike.
Well, this is information I could had used earlier. At least I get to take notes with more freedom now.
You gave it your best ~name~ but now you'll have to join me.
Whoa! Now there are two of you! Are you using the mirror pool to clone yourself?
I finally get to see some magic in action now. This piques my interests in so many ways...
Hey, who is that person behind you, Morrigan? And where did she even come from?
Good game, Mika, but it seems you are out so... Wait, is that your friend coming over here again?
Great choice! I can't wait to see its magic in action.
Show me how it's done!
Remember, I'll be watching everything you do. For science of course!
Well, ~name~, here is your chance to get comfortable.
I don't know why, but watching you undress is making me feel weird.
Seems your hand wasn't good enough this time.
You need to play better if you want to win, ~name~.
Oh, I see now. ~Name~ just wanted to get more comfortable before going on.
I may be out now, but that only gives me more freedom to watch you closely as you undress... to take notes of course...
Don't worry about me, I'm just taking a small break.
Awww, I don't know if it would had helped, but it sure looks cute.
I guess you aren't in mating season yet.
I'm going to have to correct a lot of notes before sending my report.
Hold your horses! Are you really that many points ahead?
I really lost hard didn't I?
Please excuse me while I take some samples to later test its density, weight... and taste...
I can't hold on anymore... Please experiment inside my body next.
By the way I'm sorry about before, thinking you were a female instead of... um... SORRY!
I might need a bigger test subject to get more notes on female chests though, but don't take that the wrong way.
Hehe you look just like Rainbow Dash!
But how am I supposed to study the female breasts if you hide them behind your hair?
Excelent, this is one of the best references I've found on a female human's breast. I do want to see how they react when they get touched... Maybe by me?
A pair like that could have helped me a few hands ago...
Good shot! You almost hit that little belt too, but I'm sure you'll get it next time.
Yeah... they still look like the same breasts...
Are we sure that was the only one? I think another one is close to me!
You have to teach me that spell! I want to try it next time I come to this world.
You were right not to wear extra restraints, Zone-tan. But maaaaybe you could have used the extra layer somewhere else.
Not only have I lost, but you are still taking off little stuff like ~clothing~. No fair!
I wouldn't choose to remove those stockings before your bra, personally...
Aww, Florina is leaving so soon? Also I think she dropped something there...
So why do you have those weird wings? Were you bitten by a vampire fruit bat?
WOAH! You can summon bats at will? That is so cool!
Took you long enough, huh?
What in the world...
Now that I think about it, I don't think I've ever seen any female royal guards in Equestria...
I'm curious, Marinette: What are these things you call "Akumas"?
Oh are you transforming? Does that mean you are going to grow ears and wings?
No-Bra November you say? Sounds like a fun month!
Now that I think of it... Your eyes, they're grayed out... Oh no, don't tell me Tirek stole your strength!
Learn from this loss, and you will be better for the future.
Will you go for something big?
Remember, the less you wear, the more comfortable you will feel!
Don't worry, you can still win the next hand!
Seems someone changed a card he shouldn't have.
It doesn't matter how many times you lose a hand if you win in the end!
I think I understand now. You are taking off your smaller stuff first and then going up. I don't know why you would want to make yourself feel uncomfortable for longer, but to each their own.
Oh my... And they say biology is boring...
That was certainly different... Do you think you can send a couple of vines to do the same to me? Without the whole being dropped on my head aftwerwards thing, of course...
You have a beautiful voice, Florina. You should join the Rainbooms!
Would you mind using that same spell on me once this game is over?
Was that what they call "using an assist"?
That play was incredible, Nagisa! Mind if I write to Celestia about it?
Your friendship really is magic!
This might be a bit too late to mention it, but I just noticed you could have used that collar to be in the game for another round.
With a show like that, I bet the people watching us must be very entertained!
That fall looked like it hurt a bit! Are you okay, Ochako?
Well then? At least now that I'm out of the game I'll have more chance to take some notes.
Trust me. This will feel so good.
Oh no! I hope you didn't really hit a Pegasus this time...
Well, it's not like we haven't seen this before...
Florina... You may not want to look, but the bee...
Oh are you going to use magic? I need to pay attention.
It is so nice to be able to call a friend whenever you need help.
I wish I knew about this No-Bra November thing before I came here. I wouldn't have brought my bra either.
Touching myself before must have triggered my heat. Now I just can't stop looking...
Ohhh ~name~... Don't stop... This is making me feel all warm again...
You look very... aroused... Do you need any help?
I wish you the best of luck for the rest of this game!
I guess you still feel comfortable with that.
Rarity would definitely like you.
Keep it up. You have all my support!
It doesn't matter how many times you lose a hand if you win in the end!
We still have a game to finish so let's go!
Am I allowed for me to take sides now that I'm out? If so, I hope you win this game, ~name~!
Oh, you missed your harness, Aimee.
I guess it's safe! You're a good shot, Aimee!
If that one weighs as much as the one my brother used when he was a royal guard, then it must feel so good to finally take it off!
Hey, your outfit right now looks similar to what I wore at the Fall Formal Gala!
Oh no. Are you okay there, Florina?
Sorry I couldn't help you there... But I still remember the time a honeycomb fell on my head... It wasn't pretty... or painless...
Oh I see now, you use that stick as if it were a horn to use magic, isn't that right?
Well I guess there's always the next round to see more magic in action...
I can't wait to get a stick of my own and use it on my body!
Oh, is that your cutie mark on your shirt, Marinette?
I would have brought one of mine if I knew that!
You have a friend that can talk to animals too? Maybe we should introduce them to each other sometime!
I really could have used a peek like this a few moments ago.
Join me and feel the fresh air passing by your body!
Wait, was Corrin a male all this time? B-but the way he looks, a-and...
Wait, did I say that out loud?
Why is there so many juices coming out of it? Did I do something wrong? It felt so right...
So many fluids... Did I break something?
It's so... sticky...
I'm gonna need to sit down for a while. Who knew that the human body could have such an intense orgasm?
Thanks so much trainer, I couldn't have done this without you here today.
This was a fun game! I can't wait to try it next time Rarity makes some dresses for us back in Equestria!
Good job winning the game, ~name~! I had a fun time.
Congratulations, ~name~! We made some fun memories, didn't we?
Excellent start, but I still need to do more research on human anatomy. Care to join?
No, it can't be. It isn't true! I'll beat you next time, ~name~...

text.content: ~Name~, do you have a moment?
You did really well in the game! Congratulations on winning!
I was just wondering...
Well, I'm new to this world, and I don't have anywhere to go home to yet...
I really love books, but they make for a lousy mattress. I don't want to have to sleep in the library again tonight.
If it's okay to ask, could I maybe sleep over at your house tonight?
Wow, nice house! Is it really okay if I stay with you tonight?
Don't get me wrong, I love spending all night learning, but my previous sleeping arrangements did leave a lot to be desired!
Actually... There's something I'd like to learn about that isn't in those books...
Everypony had to touch themselves at that game we played, and it was the first time I'd ever seen it done with human fingers.
But you didn't get to do it. I would have liked to have seen that...
I was wondering...
Maybe we could do an information exchange... You could find all about my human body with me, and in return I could learn what yours feels like...
And maybe I could see what it looks like when you pay the "penalty" for losing the card game?
When I did it, it felt really good!
Wow, our learning games are amazing! I feel a very special friendship forming!
I'll have to bring you to Equestria to meet the rest of my friends! How would you like to come with me and do some exploring?
Now let's get back to the fun! What did you want to show me next?

epilogue.title: Me, Herself and Her Other Self

text.content: (A few weeks after the game...)
Trust me, you are going to love the me of this dimension.
And don't worry, she might be a bit more shy than me, but I already talked to her about you and she agreed to do this. So there shouldn't be any problems!
Hey girls, could you lend me Twilight for a few minutes?
This place should be private enough. Glad you came, Twilight! This is the guy I talked to you about the other day.
I can't believe I agreed with you to do this. I have a boyfriend, you know?
Though I guess if someone knew how to convince me to do something this crazy, it would be myself.
Boyfriend? You mean that guy you have gone out with ONCE and never even speak of?
Forget about Timber.
Anyways, remember how I told you I got my own personal harem back in Equestria ever since I got my title of princess?
I think it's time for you to start your own one here. And I think ~name~ will be the perfect start!
Fine. Let's just take it slow, I don't have much experience with this... or rather any at all...
Are you seriously telling me you're still a virgin?
This is even worse than I thought!
Quick, ~name~! Take off your clothes! And Twilight, get down on your knees!
How are you feeling there, Twilight? Everything good?
It tastes a bit strange, but I think I like it...
Good, because we are barely starting here...
How am I going? Am I doing it right?
Guessing by the look on ~name~'s face, I think you're doing great!
This is it, Twilight! After this there will be no turning back. Are you ready?
Do it.
I want ~name~ to take my first time...
AHHH!!
You've been there for a while now. Are you doing okay?
It hurt a bit at first, but now it's starting to feel good!
I'm so glad to hear that.
And ~name~, I hope you don't run out of stamina because I'll be waiting for you after you finish with her...
Just as good as I remembered you, ~name~! Oh yes!
I can feel him about to cum, Twilight! Come closer and get ready to receive it with me.
See Twilight, wasn't that great?
It was amazing, I can't wait to do it again sometime!
I better go back though, the rest of the girls must be starting to get worried about where I went...
You might want to clean yourself before going back...
Hehe, true. And ~name~, thank you so much for being so careful with me, I'm never going to forget this experience.
What about your boyfriend though?
Timber Spruce? Pff... He could go make love to a tree for all I care...
From now on, ~name~ is the only one I care for.
